tr.td: HIVIND29
HIV.IND.29 People living with HIV on ART who have suppressed viral load
Draft
true

div.p: % of people living with HIV on ART (for at least six months) who have virological suppression

tr.td: intellisoftkenya
intellisoftkenya: https://www.intellisoftkenya.com/
boolean

ID: HIV.IND.29.IP
Description:
Initial Population
Logic Definition: Initial Population

ID: HIV.IND.29.DEN
Description:
Number of people living with HIV on ART at least six months with at least one routine VL result in a medical or laboratory record during the reporting period, to monitor progress towards the third 95 target | | In addition, this can also be presented as the number with suppressed VL among all people living with HIV to calculate population-level viral suppression.
Logic Definition: Denominator

ID: HIV.IND.29.NUM
Description:
Number of people living with HIV on ART for at least six months and with at least one routine VL test result who have virological suppression (<1000 copies/mL) during the reporting period.
Logic Definition: Numerator
ID: HIV.IND.29.S

Library Name: HIVElements

pre.code: define "HIV Status Positive Condition": [Condition: Concepts."HIV-positive - HIV.B.DE116"] C where C.clinicalStatus ~ ConceptsCustom."active" and exists(C.category CC where CC ~ ConceptsCustom."encounter-diagnosis") sort by start of onset.toInterval()

tr.td: Library Name: HIVIndicatorElements

pre.code: define "HIV Status Positive Condition": Elements."HIV Status Positive Condition" C where C.onset before end of "Measurement Period"

tr.td: Library Name: HIVElements
Library Name: HIVElements

pre.code: define "HIV Status Positive Observation": "HIV Status Observation" O where O.value ~ Concepts."HIV-positive - HIV.B.DE116" sort by start of effective.toInterval()

tr.td: Library Name: HIVIndicatorElements

pre.code: define "HIV Status Positive Observation": Elements."HIV Status Positive Observation" O where O.issued before end of "Measurement Period" or O.effective.toInterval() starts before end of "Measurement Period"

tr.td: Library Name: HIVIndicatorElements

pre.code: define "Has HIV-positive Status": exists "HIV Status Positive Condition" or exists "HIV Status Positive Observation"

tr.td: Library Name: HIVElements
Library Name: HIVIndicatorElements
Library Name: HIVElements
Library Name: HIVElements

pre.code: define "First On ART": (First("On ART D.DE38"))

tr.td: Library Name: HIVElements
Library Name: HIVIndicatorElements
Library Name: HIVElements

pre.code: define "routine viral load sample collection": [Procedure] P where P.status = 'completed' and P.code ~ ConceptsCustom."viral load test" and exists(P.reasonCode RC where RC ~ Concepts."Routine viral load test")

tr.td: Library Name: HIVIND29Logic

pre.code:
/** * Numerator * * Definition: Number of people living with HIV on ART for at least six months and with at least one routine VL test result who have virological suppression (<1000 copies/mL*) during the reporting period. * Calculation: COUNT of clients with "HIV status"='HIV-positive' AND "On ART"=True and "ART start date" GREATER THAN 6 months before reporting period end date AND "Date of viral load sample collection" within reporting period AND "Reason for HIV viral load test"='Routine viral load test' AND "Viral load test result" LESS THAN 1000 copies/mL */
define "Numerator": HIE."Has HIV-positive Status" and HIE."On ART H.DE47" and (months between (end of "Measurement Period") and (date from start of HE."First On ART".effective.toInterval()) > 6 months) and exists( HIE."Viral load test result D.DE387" VL with HE."routine viral load sample collection" P such that VL.partOf.references(P) and P.performed.toInterval() during "Measurement Period" where VL.value < 1000 )

tr.td: Library Name: HIVIND29Logic

pre.code:
/** * Denominator * * Definition: Number of people living with HIV on ART at least six months with at least one routine VL result in a medical or laboratory record during the reporting period, to monitor progress towards the third 95 target | | In addition, this can also be presented as the number with suppressed VL among all people living with HIV to calculate population-level viral suppression. * Calculation: COUNT of clients with "HIV status"='HIV-positive' AND "On ART"=True and "ART start date" GREATER THAN 6 months before reporting period end date AND "Date of viral load sample collection" within reporting period AND "Reason for HIV viral load test"='Routine viral load test' */
define "Denominator": HIE."Has HIV-positive Status" and HIE."On ART H.DE47" and (months between (end of "Measurement Period") and (date from start of HE."First On ART".effective.toInterval()) > 6 months) and exists( HIE."Viral load test result D.DE387" VL with HE."routine viral load sample collection" P such that VL.partOf.references(P) and P.performed.toInterval() during "Measurement Period" )

tr.td: Library Name: HIVIND29Logic
Library Name: HIVIndicatorElements
Library Name: HIVIndicatorElements
Library Name: HIVIndicatorElements

pre.code: /* * By Age Stratifiers * (0–4, 5–9, 10–14, 15–19, 20–24, 25–29, 30–34, 35–39, 40–44, 45–49, 50+ years) * */ define "By Age Stratifier": case when "Age In Years" <= 4 then '0-4' when "Age In Years" <= 9 then '5-9' when "Age In Years" <= 14 then '10–14' when "Age In Years" <= 19 then '15–19' when "Age In Years" <= 24 then '20–24' when "Age In Years" <= 29 then '25–29' when "Age In Years" <= 34 then '30–34' when "Age In Years" <= 39 then '35–39' when "Age In Years" <= 44 then '40–44' when "Age In Years" <= 49 then '45–49' when "Age In Years" >= 50 then '50+' else null end

tr.td: Library Name: HIVIndicatorElements
Library Name: HIVElements
Library Name: HIVIndicatorElements

pre.code: define "Key population member type Observation": Elements."Key population member type Observation" O where O.effective.toInterval() before end of "Measurement Period" or O.issued before end of "Measurement Period"

tr.td: Library Name: HIVIndicatorElements
Library Name: HIVIND29Logic

pre.code: define "Stratification": HIE."By Administrative Gender Stratifier".code + ':' + HIE."By Age Stratifier" + ':' + HIE."By Geographic Region Stratifier" + Combine(HIE.patientGroups, ':')

tr.td: Library Name: FHIRHelpers

pre.code: define function ToConcept(concept FHIR.CodeableConcept): if concept is null then null else System.Concept { codes: concept.coding C return ToCode(C), display: concept.text.value }

pre.code: define function ToDateTime(value dateTime): value.value

pre.code: define function ToDateTime(value instant): value.value

pre.code: define function ToString(value ProcedureStatus): value.value

pre.code: define function ToString(value AdministrativeGender): value.value

tr.th: Generated using version 0.4.6 of the sample-content-ig Liquid templates

valueString.value: define "HIV Status Positive Condition": [Condition: Concepts."HIV-positive - HIV.B.DE116"] C where C.clinicalStatus ~ ConceptsCustom."active" and exists(C.category CC where CC ~ ConceptsCustom."encounter-diagnosis") sort by start of onset.toInterval()
define "HIV Status Positive Condition": Elements."HIV Status Positive Condition" C where C.onset before end of "Measurement Period"
define "HIV Status Positive Observation": "HIV Status Observation" O where O.value ~ Concepts."HIV-positive - HIV.B.DE116" sort by start of effective.toInterval()

define "HIV Status Positive Observation": Elements."HIV Status Positive Observation" O where O.issued before end of "Measurement Period" or O.effective.toInterval() starts before end of "Measurement Period"
define "Has HIV-positive Status": exists "HIV Status Positive Condition" or exists "HIV Status Positive Observation"

define "routine viral load sample collection": [Procedure] P where P.status = 'completed' and P.code ~ ConceptsCustom."viral load test" and exists(P.reasonCode RC where RC ~ Concepts."Routine viral load test")

/** * Numerator * * Definition: Number of people living with HIV on ART for at least six months and with at least one routine VL test result who have virological suppression (<1000 copies/mL*) during the reporting period. * Calculation: COUNT of clients with "HIV status"='HIV-positive' AND "On ART"=True and "ART start date" GREATER THAN 6 months before reporting period end date AND "Date of viral load sample collection" within reporting period AND "Reason for HIV viral load test"='Routine viral load test' AND "Viral load test result" LESS THAN 1000 copies/mL */
define "Numerator": HIE."Has HIV-positive Status" and HIE."On ART H.DE47" and (months between (end of "Measurement Period") and (date from start of HE."First On ART".effective.toInterval()) > 6 months) and exists( HIE."Viral load test result D.DE387" VL with HE."routine viral load sample collection" P such that VL.partOf.references(P) and P.performed.toInterval() during "Measurement Period" where VL.value < 1000 )

/** * Denominator * * Definition: Number of people living with HIV on ART at least six months with at least one routine VL result in a medical or laboratory record during the reporting period, to monitor progress towards the third 95 target | | In addition, this can also be presented as the number with suppressed VL among all people living with HIV to calculate population-level viral suppression. * Calculation: COUNT of clients with "HIV status"='HIV-positive' AND "On ART"=True and "ART start date" GREATER THAN 6 months before reporting period end date AND "Date of viral load sample collection" within reporting period AND "Reason for HIV viral load test"='Routine viral load test' */
define "Denominator": HIE."Has HIV-positive Status" and HIE."On ART H.DE47" and (months between (end of "Measurement Period") and (date from start of HE."First On ART".effective.toInterval()) > 6 months) and exists( HIE."Viral load test result D.DE387" VL with HE."routine viral load sample collection" P such that VL.partOf.references(P) and P.performed.toInterval() during "Measurement Period" )

/* * By Age Stratifiers * (0–4, 5–9, 10–14, 15–19, 20–24, 25–29, 30–34, 35–39, 40–44, 45–49, 50+ years) * */ define "By Age Stratifier": case when "Age In Years" <= 4 then '0-4' when "Age In Years" <= 9 then '5-9' when "Age In Years" <= 14 then '10–14' when "Age In Years" <= 19 then '15–19' when "Age In Years" <= 24 then '20–24' when "Age In Years" <= 29 then '25–29' when "Age In Years" <= 34 then '30–34' when "Age In Years" <= 39 then '35–39' when "Age In Years" <= 44 then '40–44' when "Age In Years" <= 49 then '45–49' when "Age In Years" >= 50 then '50+' else null end

define "Key population member type Observation": Elements."Key population member type Observation" O where O.effective.toInterval() before end of "Measurement Period" or O.issued before end of "Measurement Period"
define "Stratification": HIE."By Administrative Gender Stratifier".code + ':' + HIE."By Age Stratifier" + ':' + HIE."By Geographic Region Stratifier" + Combine(HIE.patientGroups, ':')
define function ToConcept(concept FHIR.CodeableConcept): if concept is null then null else System.Concept { codes: concept.coding C return ToCode(C), display: concept.text.value }

title.value: HIV.IND.29 People living with HIV on ART who have suppressed viral load

description.value: % of people living with HIV on ART (for at least six months) who have virological suppression

Number of people living with HIV on ART at least six months with at least one routine VL result in a medical or laboratory record during the reporting period, to monitor progress towards the third 95 target | | In addition, this can also be presented as the number with suppressed VL among all people living with HIV to calculate population-level viral suppression.
Number of people living with HIV on ART for at least six months and with at least one routine VL test result who have virological suppression (<1000 copies/mL) during the reporting period.
